title: UTools QuickFolder
description: Transform your Unreal Engine projects with Quick Folder—an intelligent organizer that auto-sorts assets and Outliner actors into clean, categorized folders. Boost productivity, keep projects tidy, and get started instantly with folder presets!
longDescription:
Quick Folder: The Ultimate Asset and Outliner Organizer for Unreal Engine

Quick Folder is designed to revolutionize the way you organize your Unreal Engine projects. Say goodbye to messy Content Browsers and chaotic Outliners with this powerful tool that brings order and efficiency to your workflow.


Key Features:

  • Instant Folder Presets: Get started quickly with predefined folder structures for Game Development, Film & VFX, Animation & Cinematics, and Custom setups, perfectly tailored to your project needs.
  • Auto-Organize Functionality: Automatically categorize assets and actors by class types with a single click. From Static Meshes and Lights to Blueprints and Volumes, Quick Folder intelligently organizes everything, keeping your projects clean and professional.
  • Outliner Auto Organizer: Tidy up your World Outliner by moving actors into designated folders based on their class, ensuring a clear and navigable hierarchy for any team member or developer to understand at a glance.
  • Customizable and User-Friendly: Easily create, edit, and remove folders, set custom folder templates, and keep your workflow adaptable to your unique project requirements.


Why Choose Quick Folder?

Built for developers, artists, and teams, Quick Folder eliminates the clutter and confusion of traditional project management, enhancing productivity and maintaining a professional standard across all your Unreal Engine projects. Whether you're managing small scenes or large-scale productions, Quick Folder keeps your work environment organized, allowing you to focus on what truly matters: creating stunning content.



Use Cases

  • Game Development: Perfect for setting up folder structures to organize assets, levels, and blueprints right from the start of a new project.
  • Film & VFX: Streamline your content workflow with designated folders for cinematics, animations, and more.
  • Animation & Cinematics: Keep assets organized for animation-heavy projects, reducing time spent searching for files.
  • Custom: Design your own folder setup to meet unique project demands.


Take control of your Unreal Engine projects with Quick Folder—your go-to solution for effortless organization.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Instant Folder Presets: Get started quickly with predefined folder structures for Game Development, Film & VFX, Animation & Cinematics, and Custom setups, perfectly tailored to your project needs.
  • Auto-Organize Functionality: Automatically categorize assets and actors by class types with a single click. From Static Meshes and Lights to Blueprints and Volumes, Quick Folder intelligently organizes everything, keeping your projects clean and professional.
  • Outliner Auto Organizer: Tidy up your World Outliner by moving actors into designated folders based on their class, ensuring a clear and navigable hierarchy for any team member or developer to understand at a glance.
  • Customizable and User-Friendly: Easily create, edit, and remove folders, set custom folder templates, and keep your workflow adaptable to your unique project requirements.


Number of Blueprints: 1

Input: Keyboard, Mouse

Network Replicated: Yes (can be configured)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: No

Documentation: https://shorturl.at/kMplo

Video Tutorial and Overview: https://youtu.be/uVzWfI6USfs

Important/Additional Notes: While using Auto Organize All Folders be careful and patience as sorting out so many assets takes time and it may look like Unreal Editor is stuck but it would be moving assets in the background. Also to note that QuickFolder's self folder is excluded from all auto organize functions to keep it untouched.
